sentences.sentence: We can also ask elderly relatives how to best support them spiritually and use our sacrifices as an opportunity to bring us, our community and the world closer.
sentences.translation: 我们还可以询问长辈，了解如何在精神上最好地支持他们，并把我们的牺牲当成一次机会，让我们所有人、我们的社区和整个世界变得更加亲近。

sentences.sentence: He has tried to help this child materially and spiritually.
sentences.translation: 他已经尽力在物质和精神上帮助这个孩子了。

sentences.sentence: Our whole programme is spiritually oriented but not religious.
sentences.translation: 我们的整个节目以精神而不是宗教为导向。
